title: Does BTS have a schedule for V Live? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t think so. Clearly some members do more vlives than others. I think they have to show themselves from time to time but I don’t think there’re obligations regarding the lives. For example Jungkook doesn’t seem to want to do solo lives anymore so he’s not doing them. If the lives were scheduled we would’ve had at least one solo live from him since last year but we didn’t. So I’m guessing they’re pretty free in that department!
